verses.verse: וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> now behold אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּ֧א <S%H935><s%> And behold there came מִיהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> out of Judah בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> unto Bethel וְיָרָבְעָ֛ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> by the altar לְהַקְטִֽיר׃ <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> And he cried עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> against the altar בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> in the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said מִזְבֵּ֣חַ <S%H4196><s%> O altar מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> altar כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בֵ֞ן <S%H1121><s%> Behold a child נוֹלָ֤ד <S%H3205><s%> shall be born לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> unto the house דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> by name וְזָבַ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> and upon thee shall he offer עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <S%H3548><s%> the priests הַבָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> of the high places הַמַּקְטִרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> that burn incense עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against וְעַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> bones אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> upon thee and men's יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> shall be burnt עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> And he gave בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same מוֹפֵת֙ <S%H4159><s%> a sign לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <S%H4159><s%> This [is] the sign אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> Behold the altar נִקְרָ֔ע <S%H7167><s%> shall be rent וְנִשְׁפַּ֖ךְ <S%H8210><s%> that [are] upon it shall be poured out הַדֶּ֥שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> and the ashes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> the saying אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> which had cried עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> against the altar בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> in Bethel וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> that he put forth יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> from the altar לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> saying תִּפְשֻׂ֑הוּ <S%H8610><s%> Lay hold וַתִּיבַ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> against him dried up יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> on him And his hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> which he put forth עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכֹ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> so that he could לַהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <S%H7725><s%> not pull it in again אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְהַמִּזְבֵּ֣חַ <S%H4196><s%> The altar נִקְרָ֔ע <S%H7167><s%> also was rent וַיִּשָּׁפֵ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> and the ashes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> from the altar כַּמּוֹפֵ֗ת <S%H4159><s%> according to the sign אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> had given אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God חַל־ <S%H2470><s%> Intreat נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> now the face יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> and pray בַּעֲדִ֔י <S%H1157><s%> about וְתָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> may be restored me again יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> for me that my hand אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וַיְחַ֤ל <S%H2470><s%> entreated אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> accept יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַתָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> was restored him again יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> and became as [it was] before

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God בֹּאָה־ <S%H935><s%> Come אִתִּ֥י <S%H854><s%> for הַבַּ֖יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home וּֽסְעָ֑דָה <S%H5582><s%> with me and refresh וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> thyself and I will give לְךָ֖ מַתָּֽת׃ <S%H4991><s%> thee a reward

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> If thou wilt give לִי֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> me half בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> thine house לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor אָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> I will not go in עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> you וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֹ֤כַל <S%H398><s%> with thee neither will I eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> bread וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> nor drink מַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> so צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> For so was it charged אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> בִּדְבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> me by the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> Eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> no bread וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> nor drink מָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> nor turn again בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the same way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> that thou camest

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> another וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and returned בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not by the way אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that he came בָ֖הּ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel פ

וְנָבִ֤יא <S%H5030><s%> prophet אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> an זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> old יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> Now there dwelt בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> in Bethel וַיָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> came בְנ֡וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיְסַפֶּר־ <S%H5608><s%> and told ל֣וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> him all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> had done אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> that the man הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> of God הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֗ל <S%H1008><s%> in Bethel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he had spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וַֽיְסַפְּר֖וּם <S%H5608><s%> them they told לַאֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> also to their father

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> And their father אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> what זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> unto them What way הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> had seen בָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> he? For his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> way אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלַךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> which came מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> from Judah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> unto his sons חִבְשׁוּ־ <S%H2280><s%> Saddle לִ֖י הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> me the ass וַיַּחְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H2280><s%> So they saddled ל֣וֹ הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> him the ass וַיִּרְכַּ֖ב <S%H7392><s%> and he rode עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיִּ֨מְצָאֵ֔הוּ <S%H4672><s%> and found יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> him sitting תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֵלָ֑ה <S%H424><s%> under an oak וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about הַאַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> are you אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> unto him [Art] thou the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> that camest מִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> he

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Come אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> for הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home וֶאֱכֹ֖ל <S%H398><s%> with me and eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor אוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> I may לָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> not return אִתָּ֖ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְלָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> with thee nor go in אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֹ֣כַל <S%H398><s%> with thee neither will I eat לֶ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <S%H8354><s%> nor drink אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> with thee in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For דָבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> For it was said אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> to me by the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt eat לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> no bread וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <S%H8354><s%> nor drink שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> there nor turn again לָלֶ֔כֶת <S%H1980><s%> that thou camest בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָלַ֥כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> going בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said ל֗וֹ גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I נָבִיא֮ <S%H5030><s%> unto him I [am] a prophet כָּמוֹךָ֒ <S%H3644><s%> like וּמַלְאָ֡ךְ <S%H4397><s%> also as thou [art] and an angel דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֵלַי֩ <S%H413><s%> to me בִּדְבַ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> unto me by the word יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲשִׁבֵ֤הוּ <S%H7725><s%> Bring him back אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> with thee into thine house וְיֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> that he may eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְיֵ֣שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water כִּחֵ֖שׁ <S%H3584><s%> [But] he lied לֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> So he went back אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַיֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> with him and did eat לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וַיֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drank מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> as they יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> And it came to pass as they sat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן <S%H7979><s%> at the table פ וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> came unto the prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֱשִׁיבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7725><s%> that brought him back

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> And he cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> that came מִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> from Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Forasmuch as כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מָרִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H4784><s%> thou hast disobeyed פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> the mouth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> and hast not kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> the commandment אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וַתָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> But camest back וַתֹּ֤אכַל <S%H398><s%> and hast eaten לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> bread וַתֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drunk מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> of the which [the LORD] did say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> to thee Eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> no bread וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> no water לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall not come נִבְלָתְךָ֖ <S%H5038><s%> thy carcase אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֶ֥בֶר <S%H6913><s%> unto the sepulchre אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after אָכְל֥וֹ <S%H398><s%> he had eaten לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> and after שְׁתוֹת֑וֹ <S%H8354><s%> he had drunk וַיַּחֲבָשׁ־ <S%H2280><s%> that he saddled ל֣וֹ הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> for him the ass לַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> [to wit] for the prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֱשִׁיבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7725><s%> whom he had brought back

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> had gone וַיִּמְצָאֵ֧הוּ <S%H4672><s%> met אַרְיֵ֛ה <S%H738><s%> a lion בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> him by the way וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> and slew וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become נִבְלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5038><s%> him and his carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <S%H7993><s%> was cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way וְהַחֲמוֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> and the ass עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stood אֶצְלָ֔הּ <S%H681><s%> by וְהָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> it the lion עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> also stood אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside הַנְּבֵלָֽה׃ <S%H5038><s%> by the carcase

וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men עֹבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> passed by וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבֵלָה֙ <S%H5038><s%> the carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <S%H7993><s%> cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> and the lion עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> standing אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַנְּבֵלָ֑ה <S%H5038><s%> the carcase וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they came וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> and told בָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> [it] in the city אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> where הַנָּבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> prophet הַזָּקֵ֖ן <S%H2205><s%> where the old יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הַנָּבִיא֮ <S%H5030><s%> And when the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הֱשִׁיב֣וֹ <S%H7725><s%> that brought him back מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <S%H1870><s%> from the way וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> [thereof] he said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> It [is] the man הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> of God ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מָרָ֖ה <S%H4784><s%> who was disobedient אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> unto the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֨הוּ <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD לָאַרְיֵ֗ה <S%H738><s%> him unto the lion וַֽיִּשְׁבְּרֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7665><s%> which hath torn וַיְמִתֵ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> him and slain כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> him according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> which he spake לֽוֹ׃

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying חִבְשׁוּ־ <S%H2280><s%> Saddle לִ֖י אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> me the ass וַֽיַּחֲבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H2280><s%> And they saddled

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> and found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5038><s%> his carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <S%H7993><s%> cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way וַֽחֲמוֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> and the ass וְהָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> and the lion עֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> standing אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַנְּבֵלָ֑ה <S%H5038><s%> the carcase לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אָכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> had not eaten הָֽאַרְיֵה֙ <S%H738><s%> the lion אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבֵלָ֔ה <S%H5038><s%> the carcase וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁבַ֖ר <S%H7665><s%> nor torn אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> the ass

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> took up הַנָּבִ֜יא <S%H5030><s%> And the prophet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלַ֧ת <S%H5038><s%> the carcase אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיַּנִּחֵ֥הוּ <S%H3240><s%> and laid אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַחֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> it upon the ass וַיְשִׁיבֵ֑הוּ <S%H7725><s%> and brought it back וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> to the city הַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> prophet הַזָּקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> and the old לִסְפֹּ֖ד <S%H5594><s%> to mourn וּלְקָבְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H6912><s%> and to bury

וַיַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> And he laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָת֖וֹ <S%H5038><s%> his carcase בְּקִבְר֑וֹ <S%H6913><s%> in his own grave וַיִּסְפְּד֥וּ <S%H5594><s%> and they mourned עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> over ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> over him [saying] Alas אָחִֽי׃ <S%H251><s%> my brother

וַיְהִי֮ <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after קָבְר֣וֹ <S%H6912><s%> he had buried אֹתוֹ֒ <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him that he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בְּמוֹתִי֙ <S%H4191><s%> When I am dead וּקְבַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6912><s%> then bury אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> בַּקֶּ֕בֶר <S%H6913><s%> me in the sepulchre אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> wherein the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God קָב֣וּר <S%H6912><s%> [is] buried בּ֑וֹ אֵ֚צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside עַצְמֹתָ֔יו <S%H6106><s%> my bones הַנִּ֖יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמֹתָֽי׃ <S%H6106><s%> his bones

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיֹ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> shall surely יִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> come הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> For the saying אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which קָרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> which he cried בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> against the altar אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> in Bethel וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> and against all the houses הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> of the high places אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> which [are] in the cities שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria פ

אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> After הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> returned יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> not from his evil וַ֠יָּשָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> but made מִקְצ֤וֹת <S%H7098><s%> of the lowest הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <S%H3548><s%> priests בָמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> of the high places הֶֽחָפֵץ֙ <S%H2655><s%> whosoever would יְמַלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able וִיהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כֹּהֲנֵ֥י <S%H3548><s%> him and he became [one] of the priests בָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> of the high places

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> became בַּדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> And this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> This לְחַטַּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> became sin בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וּלְהַכְחִיד֙ <S%H3582><s%> even to cut [it] off וּלְהַשְׁמִ֔יד <S%H8045><s%> and to destroy מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> off פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [it] from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth פ
